content: designed to use only one skein of sock yarn shearwater lace edging features short row-shaping relaxing garter stitch and a very row 1 sl 1 k1 psso k3 yo k1 *yo k3 sl 1 k2tog psso k3 yo simple and eye-catching lace boarder the result is a light k1* repeat until 5 sts remain yo k3 k2tog crescent-shaped shawl that is perfect for summer quick and row 2 k all sts easy to knit the hardest part will be deciding which sock yarn repeat above two row until you have approx 10g of yarn left to use k two row and then bobble finished measurements finishing after blocking - 55 /140cm wide x 9 5 24 5cm deep block to size and weave in ends yarn skein top draw sock 85% superwash merino 15% nylon 437 yards / 400 meters in 95g 1 skein colourway vivid violet needles 3 75mm/us 5 circular needle 32 /80cm or longer other tapestry needle gauge 18 sts and 38 row to 4 inches/10 cm in garter stitch with 3 75mm/us 5 needles after blocking because this is a one-size shawl don t worry too much about gauge instructions set-up co 201 sts sl first 2 sts wyib k to last 2 sts w+t k to last 2 sts w+t 197 sts between wrapped stitches garter stitch body with short row shaping row 1 k to last 2 sts before wrapped stitch w+t row 2 k to last 2 sts before wrapped stitch w+t repeat above 2 row 20 times more 113 sts between wrapped stitches row 43 k to last 3 sts before wrapped stitch w+t row 44 k to last 3 sts before wrapped stitch w+t repeat above 2 row 10 times more 47 sts between wrapped stitches row 65 k to last 4 sts before wrapped stitch w+t row 66 k to last 4 sts before wrapped stitch w+t repeat above 2 row 4 times more 7 sts between wrapped stitches row 75 k across row knitting wrapped sts as you come to them without picking up the wraps row 76 repeat above row 201 sts increase row row 77 *k1 yo repeat from * k1 401 sts row 78 k all sts 2 abbreviations insert right needle into the next stitch as if to knit slip the stitch onto the right needle repeat with the next st/s stitch/es ssk stitch 2 stitches slipped insert left needle into both of these slipped stitches and knit them together slip the next stitch onto right needle as if to knit knit k knit sl1 k2tog psso the next 2 stitches together and then pass the slipped stich over and off the needle 2 sts decreased p purl wyib with yarn held to the back of the work k2tog knit two stitches together yo yarn over wrap and turn bring yarn to the front of the knitting sl next stich onto right needle as if to purl turn work over right needle is now on
